Administration.text:
Type: Pediculicide
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: Topical
Common Trade Names:  Natroba

Adult_Dosing.text: Apply to dry hair/scalp, rinse after 10m

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
<6mo: do not use
>6mo: apply to dry hair/scalp, rinse after 10m

Lactation_risk.text: Pump/dump for 8h due to risk of benzyl alcohol systemic absorption
Pump/dump for 8h due to risk of benzyl alcohol systemic absorption
Pump/dump for 8h due to risk of benzyl alcohol systemic absorption

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Infants <6mo (contains benzyl alcohol which is harmful to infants if absorbed

Common.text:
Application site erythema, irritation, dryness, exfoliation
Ocular erythema/hyperemia
Alopecia
Dry skin

Application site erythema, irritation, dryness, exfoliation
Ocular erythema/hyperemia
Alopecia
Dry skin

Application site erythema, irritation, dryness, exfoliation
Ocular erythema/hyperemia
Alopecia
Dry skin

Mechanism_of_Action.text:
"Causes neuronal excitation in insects, followed by hyperexcitation, paralysis, and death" (!)
[1]
